sentence-with-footnote: "This paper describes a case study for the ninth Transformation Tool Contest (TTC’16)******."

"It may be done by exploiting current features of model transformation engines******
column6: used for formal analysis of models by using model checking techniques
column7: by introducing new search features to the model transformation engines [AVS+14]
column8: by implementing search algorithms as transformations [DJVV14]
column9: combining search frameworks with model transformation engines [FTW15] or by translating the artifacts to dedicated encodings which already provide sophisticated search capabilities [EWZ14]."
